last_episode_to_air.name: The Mother of All Villains
last_episode_to_air.overview: Oliver grapples with an internal conflict as he walks his mother down the aisle. Meanwhile, Kaz and Skylar struggle to protect the Arcturion from all the villains it beckons.

name: Mighty Med
overview: Mighty Med is a live-action comedy series starring popular Disney Channel stars Bradley Steven Perry and Jake Short, premieres as a special one-hour event, October 7 on Disney XD. The series is created by Jim Bernstein and Andy Schwartz, and is executive produced by Bernstein and Stephen Engel.

episodes.name: Saving the People Who Save People, Part 1
episodes.overview: Two best friends discover a doorway leading to the hospital for super heroes.

episodes.name: Saving the People Who Save People, Part 2
episodes.overview: Two best friends discover a doorway leading to the hospital for super heroes.

episodes.name: Frighty Med
episodes.overview: When Oliver's dad starts to wonder where he's going after school, Oliver says he's doing a play about Frankenstein.

episodes.name: I, Normo
episodes.overview: Kaz boldly asks the most popular girl in school to the upcoming school carnival but is rejected, and tries to save face by claiming he already has a girlfriend. Much to Oliver's chagrin, Kaz invites Skylar to accompany him to the carnival, her first venture into the "normo" world, in hopes of convincing everyone that she is his girlfriend. Meanwhile, Alan tries to prove his worth to his uncle Horace by attempting to cure Titanio, a superhero with amnesia.

episodes.name: Sm'oliver's Travels
episodes.overview: Oliver uses his burgeoning medical skills at school when he performs CPR on a popular girl's poodle, which quickly elevates his social status much to Kaz's chagrin. When the popularity goes to his head, Kaz cuts Oliver down to size, literally, with a shrinking ray. Meanwhile, Horace cannot perform surgery on Citadel, an ailing superhero with an impenetrable metal exoskeleton, so shrunken Oliver is sent inside the hero's body to diagnose the problem.

episodes.name: Pranks for Nothing
episodes.overview: Pranks do not exist in Skylar's world.

episodes.name: It's Not the End of the World
episodes.overview: Kaz and Oliver meet superhero, Timeline.

episodes.name: Evil Gus
episodes.overview: When a strange illness gives Gus evil powers, Kaz and Oliver sneak him into the ER for treatment. Horace pretends to be Skylar's father for a parent-teacher conference.

episodes.name: Alan's Reign of Terror
episodes.overview: Alan is put in charge of the hospital for a day, but he abuses his power and makes life miserable for everyone.

episodes.name: So You Think You Can Be a Sidekick
episodes.overview: Kaz applies to be Tecton's sidekick, but Oliver is chosen instead. Alan and Benny form a superhero team of their own.

episodes.name: Lockdown
episodes.overview: Kaz plans a surprise birthday party for Oliver and accidentally lets in the villain Revengeance.

episodes.name: All That Kaz
episodes.overview: Oliver enlists a mind-altering superhero named Neocortex to help him become more carefree and spontaneous like Kaz. When the brainwashed Oliver is too reckless during a crisis, Kaz is forced to step up and be the responsible one.

episodes.name: The Friend of My Friend is My Enemy
episodes.overview: Skylar introduces Kaz and Oliver to her longtime friend Experion, a cool and charming teenage superhero. But when Oliver catches Experion in an evil act, he must convince Skylar that her bestie is not as nice as he seems.

episodes.name: Atomic Blast from the Past
episodes.overview: Kaz and Oliver revive a frozen-in-time superhero from the 1950s named Captain Atomic. After Captain Atomic is wounded during a battle with a contemporary villain, the boys must travel back in time to save him.

episodes.name: Growing Pains
episodes.overview: Oliver accidentally steps into the line of fire of a superhero's beam during a routine test, which reverts him back to being 4 years old. While Kaz tries to fix Oliver, Alan develops an undesirable and embarrassing power.

episodes.name: Night of the Living Nightmare
episodes.overview: Kaz and Oliver are exhausted and stuck working the overnight shift during a lunar eclipse, when it is rumored that the freakiest patients come to the hospital. When Neocortex checks in with an illness that unintentionally traps people in their worst nightmares, Kaz and Oliver desperately try to stay awake and figure out how to save everyone from their nightmares.

episodes.name: Mighty Mad
episodes.overview: Tension is high at Logan high, and Kaz becomes suspicious that his substitute teacher is actually Dr. Wrath in disguise, a supervillain who feeds on negative energy. While Kaz is determined to get to the bottom of it, Oliver helps Alan get over his aversion to normo food.

episodes.name: Fantasy League of Heroes
episodes.overview: Kaz launches a superhero fantasy league at the hospital. The heroes become obsessed with their fantasy stats and only perform saves and defeats that will boost their standings in the league.  Minnesota Vikings’ running back Adrian Peterson guest stars as himself.

episodes.name: Copy Kaz
episodes.overview: Wallace uses an optical image replicator to turn Clyde into an identical look-alike of Kaz in hopes that the disguised Clyde will trick Oliver into revealing the secret location of Mighty Med.

episodes.name: Guitar Superhero
episodes.overview: When a freak accident suddenly gives edgy rock star Jade super powers, Oliver and Kaz take her under their wings and introduce her to the world of Mighty Med.  Debby Ryan guest stars.

episodes.name: Free Wi-Fi
episodes.overview: Kaz searches for a flash drive, thinking it contains Oliver’s study guide for a test, but it turns out to be a digital jail storing a villain named Wi-Fi. When Kaz plugs the drive into his laptop, Wi-Fi enters the physical world and simultaneously pulls Kaz into the computer.

episodes.name: Two Writers Make a Wrong
episodes.overview: When Horace complains that comic book sales are down, Oliver and Kaz join the writing staff to help spice up the books. However, the boys' altered versions of the stories cause problems in the superhero community.

episodes.name: Are You Afraid of the Shark?
episodes.overview: Oliver and Skylar pet sit Horace's shark that is kept in the aquatic wing of the hospital. When Oliver feeds the shark the wrong food, the shark evolves into a man-shark.

episodes.name: The Pen is Mighty Med-ier Than the Sword
episodes.overview: Horace introduces the boys to an all-powerful device that looks like a pen, but can bring any illustration to life. Panic ensues at the hospital when the device goes missing.

episodes.name: There's a Storm Coming (Part 1)
episodes.overview: It’s been a year since Skylar lost her powers, so Oliver and Kaz decide to throw her a party to celebrate their one-year anniversary of friendship. But when they learn that Skylar is in danger of losing her powers permanently, Oliver and Kaz set out to get them back.

episodes.name: There's a Storm Coming (Part 2)
episodes.overview: It’s been a year since Skylar lost her powers, so Oliver and Kaz decide to throw her a party to celebrate their one-year anniversary of friendship. But when they learn that Skylar is in danger of losing her powers permanently, Oliver and Kaz set out to get them back.

episodes.name: How the Mighty Med Have Fallen Part 1 & Part 2
episodes.overview: Kaz and Oliver are trapped in the ER by an evil Skylar and the Annihilator and the two villains plan on taking over the hospital and eventually, the world.

episodes.name: Lair, Lair
episodes.overview: Oliver and Kaz attempt to visit the Annihilator's lair to take his collection of superpowers and restore them to the superheroes.

episodes.name: Mighty Mole
episodes.overview: Kaz and Oliver suspect that there could be a hospital mole that is working with the Annihilator.

episodes.name: The Claw Prank Redemption
episodes.overview: Kaz and Oliver know that Skylar is evil, but Skylar doesn't know they suspect anything. They need to keep it that way or she may turn on them as well. They brace themselves until Skylar asks Oliver to the school dance that night.

episodes.name: Do You Want to Build a Lava-Man?
episodes.overview: Oliver and Kaz travel to Skylar's home planet, Caldera, to search for the Annihilator's former mentor, Hapax the Elder.

episodes.name: Storm's End
episodes.overview: Kaz and Oliver find themselves ambushed by the Annihilator and Skylar Storm on Caldera. With the help of Hapax the Elder, the boys must find a way to take down the supervillains and save the world.

episodes.name: Future Tense
episodes.overview: A man from the future visits the boys and reveals himself as Kaz twenty-five years from now. Future Kaz warns the boys of an evil villain wreaking havoc on the future.

episodes.name: Stop Bugging Me
episodes.overview: Oliver, Skylar, Alan and Gus leave Mighty Med to work on a school project together, and Kaz is left alone at Mighty Med while a rare and dangerous alien bug is on the loose.

episodes.name: Less Than Hero!
episodes.overview: In an attempt to recruit new superheroes, Kaz holds superhero tryouts. Meanwhile, Oliver takes Skylar to a dance tournament to try to cheer her up when she's not allowed to compete in the superhero tryouts.

episodes.name: Oliver Hatches the Eggs
episodes.overview: Oliver must care for a sack of highly valuable eggs when a pregnant female superhero is wheeled into the ER. Kaz helps Oliver hide his "pregnant" state at school.

episodes.name: Sparks Fly
episodes.overview: When superhero Spark, a tough-as-nails teenage girl, meets Kaz at Mighty Med, they have an immediate connection. However, it fizzles quickly when she becomes overly possessive. Meanwhile, Horace puts Skylar in charge of security to keep villains out of Mighty Med.

episodes.name: Wallace and Clyde: A Grand Day Out
episodes.overview: Oliver is in charge of rehabilitating Wallace and Clyde since he believes they still have good left in them. Meanwhile, Kaz tries to give himself super powers with Skylar's help.

episodes.name: The Key to Being a Hero
episodes.overview: The Key Keeper announces his retirement, and Skylar and Kaz both express interest in becoming his replacement. Meanwhile, Oliver meets his mother's new boyfriend for the first time.

episodes.name: New Kids Are the Docs
episodes.overview: Gulliver and Chaz stumble into Mighty Med and Horace hires them, threatening Oliver and Kaz; Skylar makes a suggestion box to boost staff morale.

episodes.name: It's a Matter of Principal
episodes.overview: Jordan theorizes that superheroes are real; Stefanie calls Skylar out for having a fake identity.

episodes.name: Living a Dream
episodes.overview: Oliver experiences a weirdly vivid dream that inspires a story for a Tecton comic; Alan assist Horace in wedding planning.

episodes.name: Lab Rats vs. Mighty Med
episodes.overview: As Kaz stands by the Bionic Academy's dying Chase Davenport in the superhero emergency room, Oliver and others seek to stop Incapacitator before he incapacitates the planet.

episodes.name: Thanks for the Memory Drives
episodes.overview: Kaz needs to get a flash drive that Oliver got out of the principal before it explodes.

episodes.name: The Dirt on Kaz & Skylar
episodes.overview: Kaz and Skylar search for the all-powerful Arcturion; Oliver recruits an unlikely candidate to protect him from Mr. Terror.

episodes.name: The Mother of All Villains
episodes.overview: Oliver grapples with an internal conflict as he walks his mother down the aisle. Meanwhile, Kaz and Skylar struggle to protect the Arcturion from all the villains it beckons.
